definitions.definition: gas, smoke, or vapor that smells strongly or is dangerous to inhale.
examples: clouds of exhaust fumes spewed by cars
synonyms: effluvium; Moreexhaust; pollution "a fire giving off toxic fumes"

definitions.definition: a pungent odor of a particular thing or substance.
examples: he breathed fumes of wine into her face

definitions.definition: a watery vapor, steam, or mist rising from the earth or sea.

examples: fragments of lava hit the ground, fuming and sizzling
synonyms: smoke; archaicreek "fragments of lava were fuming and sizzling"

definitions.definition: expose (especially wood) to ammonia fumes in order to produce dark tints.
feel, show, or express great anger.
examples: he is fuming over the interference in his work
synonyms: rant and rave; informalbe hot under the collar
see red "Elsa was still fuming at his arrogance"
